TopicTitle: What are you Watching Right Now?

Articles.Content:
Hello Friends,

I am Zoya Malik and New member Here..First Time I visit this forum so wanna ask you that What You Guys Watching Right Now?

I am a bigger fan of watching TV Shows and right now I am watching The shield SeriesGate and Sherlock SeriesGate..Tell me About You Guys?
I am watching this youtube video right now:
Watching or listening?

Well, if listening counts:

Other than that, Science Channel, Discovery Channel, History Channels. Plus any other scientific or space-related content I come across.

Guy's I'm watching "Law & Order Criminal Intent online TV show". It is very interesting show. The fourth season of Law & Order: Criminal Intent premiered on NBC on September 26, 2004. It wan ended May 25, 2005. The series remained in its time slot of Sundays. Those guy's who want to watch this TV show they can visit @] www dot watch-law-and-order-criminal-intent dot com

I was watch Legend of Korra (Freaking Amazing btw) but sadly the season ended along with MLP so nothing really right now. Besides Pawn Stars, the Occasional re-run of Topgear, and other random History, Science, and Discovery channel shows.

I don't watch TV at all:sticktongue:

Don't blame ya. Most tv shows are childish or constantly repeated. I only watch criminal minds and common law. I might I'm saying watch a movie that's on demand sometimes.(My parent's gave us a 5 dollar per month spending limit so we don't flood the bill with movies.)
Watching Apollo 13 and playing KSP at on my second monitor.

Listening: The Pogues - The Band Played Waltzing Matilda

Celebrating my first safe landing in an atmospheric aircraft in KSP with Back Forty 'Truck Stop Honey.'

Perhaps if I hadn't had so many over the last few days, I would have landed more successfully on previous attempts.
